title: [Health] Study found a privately insured families paid an average of $3,000 out-of-pocket for maternal and newborn hospitalizations but for 1 in 6 families, out-of-pocket spending exceeded $5,000. And when neonatal intensive care was required, the price climbed to over $10,000 for about 1 in 11 families.
